mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma package

Submodules

mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma.tnr_ecma_freq module

mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma.tnr_ecma_freq.tnr_ecma_freq(spectrum, freqs, prominence=True)[source]

Computation of tone-to-noise ration according to ECMA-74, annex D.9 for an amplitude or complex spectrum.

The T-TNR value is calculated according to ECMA-TR/108

Parameters

spectrum :numpy.array

Amplitude or complex frequency spectrum [nperseg x nseg].

freqsnp.array

Frequency axis [nperseg x nseg] or [nperseg].

prominenceboolean

If True, the algorithm only returns the prominent tones, if False it returns all tones detected. Default is True.

Output

t_tnrarray of float

Global TNR value.

tnrarray of float

TNR values for each detected tone.

promiarray of bool

Prominence criterion for each detected tone.

tones_freqsarray of float

Frequency list of the detected tones.

mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma.tnr_ecma_st module

mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma.tnr_ecma_st.tnr_ecma_st(signal, fs, prominence=True)[source]

Computation of tone-to-noise ration according to ECMA-74, annex D.9 for a stationary signal.

The T-TNR value is calculated according to ECMA-TR/108

Parameters

signal :numpy.array

A stationary signal in [Pa].

fsinteger

Sampling frequency.

prominenceboolean

If True, the algorithm only returns the prominent tones, if False it returns all tones detected. Default is True.

Output

t_tnrarray of float

global TNR value, along time if is_stationary = False

tnrarray of float

TNR values for each detected tone

promiarray of bool

prominence criterion for each detected tone

tones_freqsarray of float

frequency of the detected tones

mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma.tnr_ecma_tv module

mosqito.sq_metrics.tonality.tone_to_noise_ecma.tnr_ecma_tv.tnr_ecma_tv(signal, fs, prominence=False, overlap=0)[source]

Computation of tone-to-noise ration according to ECMA-74, annex D.9 for a time varying signal.

The T-TNR value is calculated according to ECMA-TR/108

Parameters

signal :numpy.array

A time varying signal in [Pa].

fsinteger

Sampling frequency.

prominenceboolean

If True, the algorithm only returns the prominent tones, if False it returns all tones detected. Default is True.

overlapfloat

Overlapping parameter for the time frames of 500ms. Default is 0.5.

Output

t_tnrarray of float

global TNR value, along time if is_stationary = False

tnrarray of float

TNR values for each detected tone

promiarray of bool

prominence criterion for each detected tone

tones_freqsarray of float

frequency of the detected tones

timearray of float, only if is_stationary = False

time axis
